attributes.action: to ensure EMA is distrubuted fair and eqitable to all post 16 in further education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While it is acceptable to encourage those young people to further their education with a financial reward, i believe that this incentive should not be means tested and should be for everyone in post sixteen education. This is because I consider this method of distributing to some and not to others discriminatory.
